agent: Agent D - Business Overview & Competitive Landscape

segments.name: International Government
segments.note: FY figure derived: Total Gov $2.402B minus US Gov $1.855B

segments.name: International Commercial
segments.note: International commercial growth lagged significantly vs US commercial

geographic_breakdown.note: FY2025 UK-specific not disclosed separately; FY2024 data shown
FY2025 RoW not disclosed separately; FY2024 data shown

product_lines.name: Gotham
product_lines.description: Intelligence platform for government/defense - enables analysts to identify patterns across classified data sources, integrate disparate intelligence feeds, and support mission-critical decision-making
product_lines.note: Palantir does not disclose revenue by product line; reports by segment (Gov/Commercial) only

product_lines.name: Foundry
product_lines.description: Data integration operating system for commercial enterprises - connects disparate systems across manufacturing, supply chain, and business operations into a unified digital twin (Ontology)

product_lines.name: AIP (Artificial Intelligence Platform)
product_lines.description: Launched 2023 - integrates large language models with enterprise data while maintaining security controls; enables organizations to operationalize AI within existing workflows through the Ontology
product_lines.note: Primary growth driver behind US commercial 137% YoY Q4 acceleration

product_lines.name: Apollo
product_lines.description: Deployment infrastructure enabling continuous delivery across cloud, on-premises, and classified/air-gapped environments

government: U.S. Army (Enterprise Service Agreement up to $10B over 10 years, awarded mid-2025)
UK NHS (7-year, 330M GBP Federated Data Platform contract, Nov 2023)
UK Ministry of Defence (240M GBP contract)
commercial: Lear Corp (5-year Warp Speed manufacturing OS deal, Sept 2025)
Wendy's (supply chain digital twin across 6,450 restaurants)

key_partners.name: Google Cloud
key_partners.description: Multi-year partnership for digital transformation in retail, financial services, supply chain/logistics

key_partners.name: Object Edge
key_partners.description: Partnership for AI-native supply chain solution adoption

tam.note: TAM estimates vary widely: Palantir's IPO estimate $120B vs Morningstar's base case $1.4T. Discrepancy reflects disagreement on how broadly to define Palantir's addressable market with AIP expansion.
sources: Financhill - The Bull Case for Palantir

customer_metrics.note: Palantir does not disclose DAU/MAU or separate gov/commercial customer counts
